title: The Deal
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.Pretending she was mine seemed so harmless in the beginning...  Carrie Callihan is doing her best to keep it together.  Sure, she may have shared an inappropriate kiss with her client, but it was only one little kiss, and he was only doing her a favor.  No big deal.  Or at least that's what she keeps telling herself while Ben's busy dealing with a few bombshells of his own across town.  But when a chance meeting brings them together outside the office, Ben asks Carrie to return the favor.  And he doesn't stop there.  **This new adult romance series contains mature content, adult language, and several characters who also feature in the Tempted Series by Hazel Kelly, namely Will & Ella.
author: Hazel Kelly
